tinker: Use technology to solve community problems in a fast-paced, collaborative activity.
gather: A place for casual conversation and discussions about technology, equity and the neighborhood.
reflect: Share your vision for how technology should impact the future of Boston.
explore: How does City Hall make decisions? What are local communities talking about? Use our interactive digital tool to see Boston, and your neighborhood, through the lens of open data.
see: Encounter our inflatable exhibit, and start to imagine how technology will change Boston in the future.

eventsData.description: Smart technology is coming to our streets and sidewalks - but who's making the decisions? Beta Blocks is an innovative strategy for making sure communities determine the future of their own neighborhoods. Learn more at this special SNEAK PREVIEW of our unique inflatable exhibit, check out some smart technology, and try an interactive activity or two. All ages and backgrounds welcome!
eventsData.name: Allston

eventsData.description: Ever wonder how technology is being used in the city? From autonomous vehicles to urban sensors, new tech is everywhere and it's about time we all help to imagine what it does. Come and join the Mayor's Office of New Urban Mechanics for a special event to launch our smart tech community platform. See demos of brand new urban technology, hear from speakers about community empowerment, and add your voice to the conversation around future tech in our neighborhoods. You'll even have a chance to name our mascot! The entire Boston community is welcome, and food will be provided.
eventsData.name: Roxbury Beta Block Party

eventsData.description: Join the Beta Blocks exhibit as it visits the PLAY event in Chin Park, Chinatown. Smart technology is coming to our streets and sidewalks - but who's making the decisions? Beta Blocks is an innovative strategy for making sure communities determine the future of their own neighborhoods. Learn more at our unique inflatable exhibit, check out some smart technology, and try an interactive activity or two. All ages and backgrounds welcome!
eventsData.address: Surface Road and Beach Street, Boston, MA
eventsData.name: Greenway at Chinatown Gate

eventsData.description: Beta Blocks is visiting the Codman Square Market for their multicultural day. Check out our interactive exhibit, explore the latest urban technologies, and imagine their impact on the neighborhood. When you're done, visit the diverse market stalls and hear performances of music from around the world.
eventsData.name: Codman Square Multicultural Festival
